name: Stupid Ball Game
description:
it's a standard mobile game I'm developing to practice my skills, it's kinda garbage at the moment, you have to find a key and exit the level, only 2 levels at the moment, music is from Papers Please, this barely qualifies as a game right now.

Features that "work":

  • save/load
  • moving
  • keys
  • that's it.

Features I'm working on:

  • keys open door to next area of map(like in doom)
  • fix crap control sensitivity.
  • sound effects
  • more levels

this game is super early in development, as in I started it the night before I wrote this description and only worked on it for 3 hours max.
